Author: Elypha
Name: BilingualTooltips
Description:
Yes, we have tooltips displayed in two languages now. You paid SE for 4 languages so make good use of it.

- Wanna know and learn how that item is written in another language? - No problem.
- Got fed up of カタカナ and would rather read the English words? - We've got you.
Punchline: In case the WoL speaks more than one language
